videos.description: JaVale McGee takes hold of a loose ball and weaves through defenders across the court on his way to a coast-to-coast slam dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (JaVale McGee went coast-to-coast on 'em) 2020/12/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: JaVale McGee went coast-to-coast on 'em

videos.description: Jerami Grant pulls up and swishes a half-court buzzer-beater to cap a 19-3 run to end the third quarter for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jerami Grant drills half-court buzzer-beater) 2020/12/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jerami Grant drills half-court buzzer-beater

videos.description: Collin Sexton scores 32 points on 15-of-23 shooting for the Cavaliers throughout a double-overtime win vs. the Pistons 128-119.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Collin Sexton's 32 points leads Cavs to 2OT win) 2020/12/26 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Collin Sexton's 32 points leads Cavs to 2OT win
